Browse the source code of netbsd/external/bsd/wpa/dist/src/utils/ip_addr.h

1/*
2 * IP address processing
3 * Copyright (c) 2003-2006, Jouni Malinen <j@w1.fi>
4 *

6 * See README for more details.
7 */
8
9#ifndef IP_ADDR_H
10#define IP_ADDR_H
11
12struct hostapd_ip_addr {
13 int af; /* AF_INET / AF_INET6 */
14 union {
15 struct in_addr v4;
16#ifdef CONFIG_IPV6
17 struct in6_addr v6;
18#endif /* CONFIG_IPV6 */
19 u8 max_len[16];
20 } u;
21};
22
23const char * hostapd_ip_txt(const struct hostapd_ip_addr *addr, char *buf,
24 size_t buflen);
25int hostapd_parse_ip_addr(const char *txt, struct hostapd_ip_addr *addr);
26
27#endif /* IP_ADDR_H */
28
